shape_0_per_frame2=y = rand (100)/100;
shape_0_per_frame3=

shape_0_per_frame5=y = .5 + .4*cos(time*.7);

shape_0_per_frame7=
shape_0_per_frame8=a = .2*bass;

shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000

per_frame_1=zoom = 1.0;
per_frame_2=warp = 0;
per_frame_3=rot = 0;
per_frame_4=dx = 0;
per_frame_5=dy = 0;
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=monitor = frame;
warp_1=`float buf2;
warp_2=`float2 uv1;
warp_3=`
warp_4=`float GetBuf(float num, float2 uvi)
warp_5=`{return dot(GetPixel(uvi), float3(num%2,(num+1)%2,0))-.5;}
warp_6=`
warp_7=`shader_body {
warp_8=`
warp_9=`float2 pix = texsize.zw*4;
warp_10=`
warp_11=`//noise dither
warp_12=`uv1 = uv + .001*(tex2D (sampler_noise_lq,uv*4+rand_frame)-.5);
warp_13=`
warp_14=`buf2 = (GetBuf(frame, uv1+pix*float2(1,0))
warp_15=`       +GetBuf(frame, uv1+pix*float2(0,1))
warp_16=`       +GetBuf(frame, uv1+pix*float2(-1,0))
warp_17=`       +GetBuf(frame, uv1+pix*float2(0,-1)))/2 - GetBuf(frame+1, uv1);
warp_18=`buf2 = buf2*.996+.5;
warp_19=`
warp_20=`
warp_21=`if (frame%2 == 0) 
warp_22=`{ret.r = buf2;
warp_23=` ret.g = GetPixel(uv).g;}
warp_24=`
warp_25=`else 
warp_26=`{ret.g = buf2;
warp_27=` ret.r = GetPixel(uv).r;}
warp_28=`
warp_29=`}
comp_1=`sampler sampler_lichen;
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`ret = tex2D (sampler_lichen, uv + lum(GetBlur1(uv))-.5);
comp_5=`ret = lum(GetPixel(uv));
comp_6=`}
comp_7=`
comp_8=`
